Name: Animalistic
Description: Discard all of your Traits. Draw a random Beast card that is not in play. The rules for that Beast are now in effect for you. At the end of your next turn, discard that Beast card.

Name: Beast whisperer
Description: Once per turn, you may pay 1 Gold to move a Beast 1 space in any direction.

Name: Speedy
Description: On your turn, you have 6 actions. You can only play 1 card per turn.

Name: Blood thirsty
Description: When you kill an opposing Acolyte, gain 1 Gold.

Name: Chain reaction
Description: When an Acolyte dies on or adjacent to a space with your Acolytes: you may sacrifice your Acolyte to kill an opposing Acolyte on its space or an adjacent space. This can cause a chain reaction, and can happen during any player's turn.

Name: Nomadic
Description: You can only have 1 Banner in play at a time. However, you may score that Banner immediately upon playing it at the end of your turn.

Name: Outpost
Description: When placing Banners, you may place two Banners on the same space.

Name: Provocative
Description: When your Colossus moves into a space containing Beasts or other Colossi, you may move them 1 space in any direction.

Name: Resurrecting
Description: When any of your Acolytes die, you may move them to your Colossus's space instead of back to your hand.

Name: Protective
Description: Acolytes on your Colossus's space cannot be killed or moved. If your Colossus is on the same space as one of your Banners, that Banner cannot be replaced by an opponent.

Name: Sidecar
Description: At the beginning of your turn, name another player aloud. For this turn, you can use their Acolytes and Colossus for Road Movement.

Name: Abundant
Description: At the start of your turn, draw 2 Colossus cards instead of 1.

Name: Aware
Description: At the start of your turn, you may either look at the top two Environment tiles, or the top 2 Colossus Cards.

Name: Mobile
Description: When you move, all tiles with your Banners on them are adjacent to each other, and you may move freely between them. This only applies when you are moving during your turn.

Name: Boldness
Description: On your turn, you may pay 2 Gold to take an extra action. You can do this multiple times per turn.
